alert.note: Alert for East Glacier Park Region; Northern High Plains (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 20 at 1:44AM MST until January 20 at 12:00PM MST by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON MST TODAY... * WHAT...Blowing and drifting snow. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...Eastern Glacier National Park and adjacent foothills and plains. * WHEN...Until noon MST today. * IMPACTS...Areas of blowing snow could reduce visibility and cause slippery roads and partial lane blockages. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Impacted areas include US highway 2 near Marias Pass and US highway 89 and Duck Lake Road in the Browning area.
info.instruction: Use caution while traveling, especially in open areas. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1 or visiting the MDT Road Report website.

area.areaDesc: East Glacier Park Region; Northern High Plains
